thread.title: Man held for beating girlfriend's infant to death
thread.title_full: Man held for beating girlfriend's infant to death | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man held for beating girlfriend's infant to death
text:
Johannesburg - A 11-month-old baby boy who was allegedly beaten to death by his mother's boyfriend in Johannesburg had swelling on his head and was bruised all over his body, police said on Sunday.
"It was very sad to see a baby in that condition," said Warrant Officer Xoli Mbele.
A postmortem would confirm what killed the infant but his mother's boyfriend, a 21-year-old Zimbabwean national, was arrested and charged with murder.
Mbele said the baby's 18-year-old mother was originally from Swaziland.
